page.title: 02Education
page.content: Harbottle Church of England Aided First School shares its Headteacher, Mr George N.Taylor BA with Netherton Northside County First School. There are 20 full time pupils in Harbottle and 12 in Netherton.Mrs. Marjorie Carr is the full time Assistant Teacher in Harbottle and Mrs. Pat Hedley in Netherton Mr. Taylor halfs each day between each school, alternating mornings and afternoons, week by week. Mrs. Hedley teaches in Harbottle for half a day per week to take the Music. Mts. Carr teaches Art and Craft in Netherton for half a day per fortnight. Every Wednesday the older children from Harbottle are taken to Netherton to join with the older ones there. Physical Education is the main activity then
